sentences.sContent: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.sCn: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.sContent: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.sCn: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

sentences.sContent: ...I momentarily wondered if I couldn't just call an expert on the subject matter which I was tackling...

...often depending on the subject and course difficulty...
...It is not convincing if you say you have chosen the subject because you enjoy it...
...having a passion for my subject is possibly the best reason to go into postgraduate education...
...it's natural to look for what may appear to be the most“practical” way out of the problem:“Major in a subject designed to get you a job” seems the obvious answer to some...
...whatever his sunny speeches on the subject might suggest...
...in any subject was a near-guarantee of at least middle-class wages...
...Will room-renters be subject to hotel taxes...
...Where they will keep the same four core subject teachers for two years...
